member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON
member.summary: Contains information used in handling the RBN_CHEVRONPUSHED notification code.

member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON.hdr
member.summary: structure that contains additional information about the notification.

member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON.uBand
member.summary: Index of the band sending the notification.

member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON.lParam
member.summary: Application-defined value associated with the band.

member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON.rc
member.summary: structure that defines the area covered by the chevron.

member.name: NMREBARCHEVRON.lParamNM
member.summary: An application-defined value. If the RBN_CHEVRONPUSHED notification was sent as a result of an RB_PUSHCHEVRON message, this member contains the message'slAppValue value. Otherwise, it is set to zero.
